myWorkArray.title: Portfolio Site
myWorkArray.cardInfo: Not only developed as a showcase of my work but also a demonstration of development best practices I have learned over the years. Look here for unit tests, DRY code, and seperation of concern.
myWorkArray.about: I built this portfolio primarily to showcase my skills with development and design. The site itself incorporates much of the knowledge and experience I learned while working at Shift72. In addition, I used it as an opportunity to learn React Hooks to keep up to date with the current React paradigm.

myWorkArray.title: Shift72
myWorkArray.cardInfo: Video on demand platform for film festivals.
myWorkArray.about: Shift72 is a company that provides online video solutions for content owners and distributors. I was involved in various projects, such as developing an API for uploading translations, building custom sites for clients, creating reusable components for the platform, and upgrading the platform to meet accessibility standards. I gained valuable experience in architecting and implementing web applications, collaborating with different teams and stakeholders, and writing clean and maintainable code.

myWorkArray.title: Reroll
myWorkArray.about: A movie recommendations website that uses React and The Movie Database API. The website allows users to discover films based on their tastes and preferences. It was my first complete web app and my introduction to React. I designed and developed it entirely by myself as a personal project.
